# btp_subaccount_role_collection_base (Data Source)

Gets metadata for a specific subaccount role collection.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "btp_subaccount_role_collection_base" "target_base_collection" {
  subaccount_id = "6aa64c2f-38c1-49a9-b2e8-cf9fea769b7f"
  name          = "Subaccount Administrator"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role collection.
- `subaccount_id` (String) The ID of the subaccount.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the role collection.
- `read_only` (Boolean) Whether the role collection is read-only.
